Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~jyellick ~ales Anything we need to do here for v2.0?

Action.author: ales
Action.body: My 2 cents: I wouldn't do anything about it in 2.0 and wait to see how the validator/committer refactoring develops because things might still change (e.g. we might no longer have endorsement/validation plugins to begin with).
